attributes.action: Make VE day a must in the UK and st George's Day a must.
attributes.additional_details: Make streets be able to run events like these no matter what people complain it's our history and people taught together for our chance to do what we want. And that should be celebrated and they should be thanked every year for it. And also it lets people have a sense of belonging and unifi us.
attributes.background: Simple put it into the calender and let people come together and celebrate what great sacrifices were made for us. And also we can come together and bring people together. Because to often our celebrations in this country is dissapearing and these events are not seen and are never seen on the news.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you mean by "Make VE day a must in the UK and st George's Day a must".

If you'd like these days to be bank holidays, you could start a new petition asking for that. There's already a petition about St George's Day that you can sign:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/241732
